clickhide_instructions.message: baada ya kufunga dukizi hii , click (au haki-click ) kipengele kwenye ukurasa huu.

description.description: Note: this cannot be longer than 132 characters
description.message: Used by over 50 million people, a free ad blocker that blocks ALL annoying ads, malware and tracking.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Adblock Plus pamoja ni walemavu kwa ajili ya nyanja hapa chini. Unaweza kuongeza miliki aidha kupitia Adblock Plus pamoja na icon katika bar anwani au kwa kuandika miliki (sio URL) katika sanduku na kubonyeza " kuongeza miliki " kifungo .

enable_only_the.message: Kuwawezesha tu orodha filter unahitaji. Wengi mno wanaweza kufanya browser yako imekwama.

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Filter yako lazima kufuata Adblock Plus chujio syntax .

found_a_bug.message: Kupatikana mdudu ? Wanataka kutafsiri Adblock Plus katika lugha yako ? Tafadhali faili ombi hapa .

name_devbuild.message: Adblock Plus pamoja na maendeleo ya kujenga

notification_with_buttons.message: Bonyeza 'OK' kufungua viungo vyote katika taarifa hii.

notification_without_buttons.message: Bonyeza kwenye taarifa ya kufungua viungo vyote ndani yake.

out_of_date_lists.message: Nje ya tarehe orodha ni updated mara kwa mara.
